# cancel()

**Instance Method**

Requests that the capture session be canceled.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func cancel()
```

## Discussion

Call this when the user indicates they want to cancel the scan.  Calling this method eventually transitions the session to `.failed(Error)` Once the session enters the failed state  it is safe to tear down the session and create a new one if desired.

## Controlling the session

- **finish()**: Requests that the capture session be stopped and all data saved.
- **pause()**: Pauses the automatic capture and other resource-intense algorithms.
- **requestImageCapture()**: Requests a manual image capture.
- **resume()**: Resumes object tracking algorithms after [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ObjectCaptureSession/pause()] is called.
- **startCapturing()**: Begins taking images for object capture.
